The health of the Amazon is critical for the health of our planet. These massive rain forests are considered the world’s lungs and are currently being destroyed by severe fires. Whether in Chicago or across the world, the Amazon affects us all. https://t.co/U9Gr3kW67A
Health care is a human right. We must do more. That is why I wrote an op-ed explaining our country’s need for a public option. Our constituents have waited long enough. https://t.co/aBxlEi3HlE
Thank you to the more than 60 employers and many job seekers who made our hiring event a great success! https://t.co/KHRf4RaGtq

I am sick and tired of a President who puts the interests of the gun lobby above the safety of our communities. Ninety percent of Americans support universal background checks. The House passed this bill already. Senate must act. https://t.co/nPHA0cWjGA

We need stronger gun safety laws, like the universal background check legislation still waiting for a vote in the Senate. We need more mental health programs and resources. We need to expand economic opportunity in communities suffering from daily violence.

We cannot continue to respond to this epidemic with shrugs of indifference. I proudly cast my vote for bipartisan universal background check legislation. The Senate must act. This is the least we can do to honor the memories of all those lost daily to gun violence.

Our higher education system remains out of reach for too many and saddles countless Americans who do graduate with insurmountable debt. Education is a cornerstone of the American Dream, and we need to do more to ensure it is achievable for all families.

This is an unacceptable abuse of the legal guardianship system to scam financial aid intended for families who need it most. The Department of Education must exercise proper scrutiny to make sure this vital assistance isn’t going to families trying to game the system. https://t.co/DKFbk5jF1e

With the departure of DNI Coats, the number of cabinet officials willing to speak truth to the President is dwindling down to zero. I have serious concerns about nominee Rep. John Ratcliffe, who seems to have been chosen on basis of his personal loyalty & fierce defense of POTUS

Please keep in your thoughts the 400 Illinois National Guard members who are deploying to Afghanistan this week. We owe a great debt to the men and women who step forward to serve our nation. https://t.co/oAdXiNE182

We had a great crowd today for our third annual “Bike the Tenth” ride. I always look forward to this opportunity to enjoy the great trails in our district and have some good conversation. Luckily the weather cooled down today too! Thanks everyone who came and rode along. https://t.co/eeyHYGj3Ay

Wisconsin taxpayers may be paying the price for the Walker administration’s exorbitant economic incentives, but it is Illinois residents & small businesses who will be underwater – literally - due to our neighboring state’s irresponsible decision to ignore environmental reviews

I was proud to vote to permanently extend the 9/11 Victims' Compensation Fund. These heroes put themselves in harms way to save others. We owe it to them to have their back now, particularly as many first responders face serious health concerns as a result of their service. https://t.co/sJntP0obD3

Global climate change is affecting the health of our planet and threatening the future we pass to our children. It requires urgent action now. Today I co-sponsored a new resolution recognizing climate change as a national emergency. #ClimateEmergency
